title: Tense Operational Alliance
description: Despite BarbarigoCadet operating six critical properties for the Consiglio (including public docks and commercial buildings), the relationship is marked by deep suspicion as evidenced by the negative trust score (-24.54). This creates a complex dynamic where strong operational interdependence (strength score 887.07) coexists with strategic wariness, likely due to BarbarigoCadet's unusual influence as a Popolani with patrician connections.
